scripts.build:simple: pnpm run build && pnpm run -C ./examples/simple build
scripts.build:hono: pnpm run build && pnpm run -C ./examples/hono build
scripts.build:hono-edge: pnpm run build && pnpm run -C ./examples/hono build:edge
scripts.test: pnpm run build && pnpm run -r test
scripts.publish:beta: changeset pre enter beta && pnpm run prepublishOnly && changeset publish -r --tag beta && changeset pre exit
